## CodeBuilderOptions.filesystem property

Filesystem adapter for file operations.

**Signature:**

```typescript
filesystem: FileSystemAdapter;
```

## Remarks

For Node.js environments, use `NodeFileSystemAdapter` from `@boba-cli/machine/node`<!-- -->. For browser environments, provide a custom implementation or memory-based adapter.
